inn1.comm: banged through covers for four, Sehwag plonks his front foot forward and crashes that through the in field, too full and wide from Pollock
hits a better length this time, not full enough for Sehwag to get forward, not wide enough for him to free his arms, the batsman lets it go
beaten, perfect line and length, oitches on off and moves a shade away, Sehwag pushes forward and the ball misses the outside edge
what's going on here? That ball cut back into Sehwag from outside off and hit him on the pad and ballooned back to Pollock who was confident he had a caught and bowled, the umpire thought otherwise
pitches outside off and cuts away from the right-hander, Pollock is moving the ball both ways, Sehwag lets it go
cut to point on the back foot
whoops, uncharacteristic loosner from Ntini, fired wide down leg side, Boucher had no chance to cut that off
another wide, this one pitches outside off and moves wider away from Tendulkar
the radar's fixed now, in the channel outside off and on a good length, Tendulkar lets it go
pitches on a good length and bounces sharply into Tendulkar's ribs, defended down on the leg side
pitches outside off and cuts into Tendulkar who gets hit on the pad
beaten, pitches short of a length on off and holds its line, Tendulkar played inside the line and missed it
defended towards covers on the front foot, Ntini is hurrying Tendulkar with pace and bounce
good length on off stump, Tendulkar gets forward and defends, Ntini finishes the over superbly after a poor start
fullish length on off stump, Sehwag gets behind the line and defends solidly
pitches short of a length and moves a shade away from Sehwag, he plays a half-drive at it and gets beaten
played to point with an angled bat, Pollock isn't giving Sehwag any room
and again, the ball cuts back into Sehwag from outside off, cramping him for space, defended on the off side

dropped by smith at first slip, Sehwag hung his bat outside off stump, the ball kissed the edge and Smith reacted very late, he seemed to be waiting for Boucher to take the catch and finally lunged one-handed, diving  to his left, but couldn't hold on
defended to point
cut to point but doesn't beat the in field
pitches on off, jags back and cuts Tendulkar in half, the ball threads the gap between bat and body
a touch too full and straight, Tendulkar works it off his pads through midwicket to get off the mark
driven trhough covers, not timed well but he found the gap
pitches short of a length, bounces on the batsman who jumps up and defends on the leg side
defended on the leg side
short of a length, off stump line, Tendulkar defends on the front foot
and again, the batsman can't do much when it's pitched just outside off and on a good length, Tendulkar lets it go
Tendulkar offers no shot to a ball that pitches outside off and holds its line, Pollock thinks he has a case for lbw but the umpire doesn't
worked off the pads to midwicket
loud appeal for lbw, the ball pitches outside off, cuts back, Tendulakr gets caught on the crease and is hit on the pad, a touch too high
similar ball that jags back from off stump, this time Tendulkar plays forward and gets hit on the pad again, he's looking jittery
punched to covers on the back foot, Sehwag's feet movement is more assured than Tendulkar's
short and wide and Sehwag has a go at it, slashes it down to third man who fields it on the bounce
short of a length and cutting back into Tendulkar, the bounce hurries him, defended on the leg side
pushed to covers on the front foot, bit more confident on that occasion
pinned back by the length and the bounce, the line is excellent as well - on off stump
straighter ball, Tendulkar plays back, gets behind the line and defends to mid on
defended back to the bowler, Pollock isn't giving Sehwag any leeway in terms of line and length
this time it's wide outside off and Sehwag slashes at it, the ball moves away from the right-hander and beats the edge
pitches on off, on a good length adn shapes away from the right hander, it's too good for Sehwag who prods forward and is beaten
dead straight and as usual, a perfect length, Sehwag has to defend
caught behind, you could see it coming, Pollock pitched that on a good length just outside off stump, the ball moved a shade away from Sehwag who played away from his body and got the edge

and he lasts just one ball, very similar to the one that got Sehwag, pitches outside off on a good length, moves away ... Laxman feels for it away from his body and edges to first slip, Smith hangs on to a simple catch
drifting on to the pads, worked down to fine leg for a single
deja vu from the Pro20 game, the ball angles across Mongia after pitching on middle, the length is perfect and Mongia pushes forward and gets beaten
a touch shorter in length outside off stump, defended on the back foot
played past point with an open face
banged in short of a length outside Tendulkar's off stump, he stands up on the back foot and defends, hard to see where India's runs are going to come from
Ntini pushes Tendulkar on the back foot again, defended back to the bowler
pitches outside off and holds its line, Mongia does the best thing he can do to that delivery, he leaves it alone
Pollock drifts on to the pads, Mongia clips that through square leg, Gibbs races after it and pulls it in, what's more he cuts of the third
defended on the off side
superb line and length to the left-hander, pitches on off and angles across him from over the wicket, left alone by the batsman
a touch shorter in length outside off, Mongia defends on the back foot

Mongia shows good judgement in leaving that one, trademark Pollock delivery, there are only so many ways in which you can describe balls that pitch on a good length, on off stump and angle across the left hander
short of a length and Ntini cuts it into Tendulkar who plays it on the back foot
defended back to the bowler
short of a length, outside of stump, pinning Tendulkar on the back foot, same old same old .. defended on the off side
a touch shorter and Tendulkar swivels and pulls, doesn't make proper contact but he'll get a single to fine leg
the left-hand right-hand combination is making Ntini alter his line, he drifts on to Mongia's pads, worked through square leg
he found the right line this time, steep bounce after it pitches outside off on a good length, left alone by the batsman
pitches on of stump, moves back into Tendulkar off the pitch, he defends it on the back foot
fullish length, Tendulkar gets a little forward and works it off his pads to midwicket
in the channel outside off stump, Tendulkar lets it go
straighter line, angling into Tendulkar, defended on the front foot
pitches outside off, shapes away from the right-hander, Tendulkar watches it go past
short of a length on off stump, Tendulkar defends to cover
full ball on middle and leg, Mongia defends to mid-on
pitches on a length and angles across Mongia from over the wicket, the batsman shoulders arms
wide outside off stump this time, left alone again
straight ball on off stump, short of a length so Mongia goes back, gets behind the line and defends
again it is wide outside off and moving further away, Mongia lets it go
left alone again outside off
tucked off the pads through midwicket
on a good length on off stump, Mongia stands tall and punches to point
loud appeal for lbw, that pitched outside leg and was missing leg stump as well, Mongia moved across and got hit on his front pad
pitches on leg and middle stump and moves back into the left-hander, defended to midwicket
punched off the back foot to covers, stylish shot but can't beat the in field
driven back to the bowler, end of another tight over
short and wide outside off, Tendulkar tries to cut but doesn't make proper contact, if he was in form you could imagine him slashing that through the infield
short and wide again, the bounce is big and Tendulkar gets beaten on another cut shot
short of a length outside off stump, Tendulkar thinks about playing it but pulls his bat away last minute
left alone outside off stump, even Kallis is pinning him on the back foot
a touch fuller, Tendulkar gets forward and drives to cover
short of a length and angling into Tendulkar, defended on the back foot, Kallis starts with a maiden
banged in short of a length and Mongia stands on tippy-toe and plays it down
full ball and swinging back into the left-hander, defended on the leg side
short in length angling across Mongia, there's enough room to cut but he doesn't find the gap at point
short ball, Mongia tries to pull from outside off and miscues it to mid-on, Nel takes a tumble on his follow through
tight line, tight length, no run
tucked to square leg off his hips, Nel starts with a maiden as well
defended on the leg side
wide outside of stump, Tendulkar pushes hard at it and gets an outside edge wide off the slip cordon for four
drifts on to the pads, nicely tucked through midwicket for two
fuller length on off stump, Tendulkar drives on the front foot but finds cover
short and wide outside off, Tendulkar tries to cut hard and the ball hits the inside half of the bat and rolls to point
defended on the off side
fired in full and fast, Mongia drives to cover and the batsmen hesitate in going for the single and then decide to take it&
full ball, angling into Tendulkar from over the wicket, defended to midwicket
full ball drifting on to the pads, Tendulkar moves across and clips it down to fine leg
defended back to the bowler
Mongia hits it hard at point, Gibbs dives to his left to cut off the boundary and the batsmen decide against the single as well, India just can't beat this infield
short of  a length on middle and leg, defended on the leg side on the back foot
oops, Gibbs mis-fields at point to allow the single, Tendulkar played the square drive to one that was a bit shorter that it should have been
left alone outside off stump
dropped a fraction short on off and middle, Tendulkar picks it up early, goes back and pulls through midwicket for four
Kallis bowls it full this time, Tendulkar gets forward and plays his trademark straight drive past mid-on for four more
driven to mid off on the front foot, he's hitting the ball better after drinks
short and wide outside off stump, cut down to third man for one
on a good length, pitches on off and cuts back in, Tendulkar defends on the back foot and Nel gives him a stare
full and going down middle and leg, tucked to the man at  mid-wicket
fiery! Nel bounces Tendulkar with one that has him hurrying down onto his haunches as the ball sails over his left shoulder
even better! This one's quicker and shorter and Tendulkar again ducks down out of harm's way, and there's a big smile from the big man
full on off stump, driven back to Nel on one bounce, who gets acrobatic in his followthrough and falls over taking it
too full outside off stump, Tendulkar leans across and opens the face of the bat, running it down to Prince at wide third man
lands on a good length outside off stump, and Mongia hustles into his back-foot defence, taps that into the covers
lands it outside off stump again, and Mongia defends it back into the covers
quicker on a good length, but the line's leg stump, and Mongia goes back and taps it in front of square leg, Tendulkar responds and they pick up a quick run
full and wide outside off stump, Tendulkar gets across and shoulders arms, and umpire Doctrove signals a wide
fullish length, squeezed down to third man
there's that good length on middle and leg again, and this time Mongia cant work it away through the gap at mid-wicket
lands a tad fuller outside off stump and Mongia unleashes a weak attempt at a stand-and-deliver square drive, but cant beat the man at backward point
fullish on leg stump, easy pickings for Tendulkar who just turns that around the corner for a single
quick ball on a good length on middle and off, Mongia eases into a flick but picks out the man at mid-wicket
short and wide, Mongia stands and has a nothing swish at it, feet go nowhere, and he's beaten
good shot for no runs, a tad full outside off stump and this time he connects with a better-looking drive through the line, but a diving stop at cover saves runs
fired in full outside leg stump, Mongia tries to flick but misses
lands on a good length on middle and leg, tucked into mid-wicket
flat trajectory on off stump, pushed into the covers
tossed up outside off, Mongia goes back and drives to cover
tossed up teasingly outside off stump, forward comes Tendulkar and drives into the off side gap
tossed up outside off stump, Mongia comes forward and pokes at it, ball kisses the edge and runs away for four, not convincing
flatter on leg stump, he goes back and works that to square leg
drifting on to the pads from over the wicket, worked through midwicket for a single
wide ball outside off stump, Mongia tries to run it down to third man but doesn't connect well
short of a lentgth and a toucher closer to off stump, this time Mongia chops it down to third man
Nel hits Tendulkar on the arm, he banged that short and Tendulkar tried to get out of the way, the ball didn't bounce at all and hit him on the arm guard
fullish length and angling into Mongia, defended on the off side
short ball, Mongia tries to get on top of it and pull but doesn't time it perfectly, he manages to hit that behind square
worked behind square leg for a single
tossed up slow through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot
streaky four, Peterson angles it into Tendulkar who backs away and tries to loft inside out over extra cover, he gets a thick edge down to the third man fence
fired down leg side, hits the pad on the way through
down leg side again, Tendulkar plays the paddle sweep but can't beat short fine leg
he makes room again and this time connects well with the inside out drive, that was a bit uppish but it found the gap at cover
defended on the off side
short of a length on off stump, cramping Mongia for room with the angle, defended on the back foot
drifting on to the pads, Mongia moves across and plays that behind square
short of a length angling into the rib-cage, tucked behind square for a single
short of a length outside off stump, defended on the back foot towards point
clipped away off the pads and he gets it wide of the fielder at midwicket
Peterson drifts onto middle and leg, Tendulkar quickly picks up the length and slaps it away to the fine leg fence
short ball, pulled away off the back-foot and the ball races away to deep square leg
makes room and cuts it away with the spin to the gully region. Dangerous shot that - had he missed it would have been curtains
comes down the track, but fails to get to the pitch of the delivery. defended in the end
played back to the bowler
starts off with a good length delivery outside the off stump, driven away towards cover
stopped a bit after hitting the deck, ball rolls away off the outer half of the bat
in the channel outside the off stump, Tendulkar watchfully plays it away towards point
short and wide outside the off stump - slapped straight to Gibbs at point
steered down to third man for a single
good looking late cut and the ball rolls away towards deep backward point
good length deliery outside the off stump. Mongia plunges forward and drives it down to long-off for a single

and he does it again - tossed up and drifting down the leg side - Tendulkar waits for the ball to turn and at the last moment slaps it away well wide of the diving fielder at short fine leg. Made contact well after the ball had passed the pad
comes down the track but fails to get to the pitch of the delivery, defended in the end.
goes for the sweep but fails to make contact
flighted delivery, again drifting down the leg side and Tendulkar paddles it down to short fine leg for a single
bit of width offered, Mongia goes for the cut and the ball zips past the otuside edge - beaten by the extra bounce there
tucked away off the pads to the backward square leg region, easy single and Tendulkar moves to 49.
short of a good length delivery, bit of width offered - Mongia waits for the ball and cuts it down to third man for a single
short rising delivery outside the off stump, came back in a touch - Tendulkar hops across and defends it away towards point. Well played in the end
good length delivery outside the off stump, the one that goes straight on - Tendulkar looking to run it down to third man fails to make contact and the ball rips past the outside edge

short and wide outside the off stump - as easy as shelling peas for a batsman of Tendulkar's caliber - moves back and across and hammers it to the backward point fence. Third man hardly got any time to react. Gets to his fifty in style
driven straight to the fielder at mid-on
fuller and on the pads, Mongia efortlessly flicks it away to the midwicket fence - India on the move here.
goes for the cut and the ball rolls away off the bottom half of the bat
defended on the front-foot
tossed up on middle and leg, driven down to long-on for a single
on the middle and leg stump line, Tendulkar goes for the paddle sweep but fails to make contact
slog sweep - the kind of shot which we seldom see him play - fantastic diving stop at deep midwicket saves three runs
on the middle and leg stump line, turned away towards midwicket
good length delivery outside the off stump, steered away towards gully
fuller length delivery on the stumps, driven with a straight bat and the ball goes straight to the fielder at mid-on
another line and length delivery, punched back to the bowler
defended watchfully
and it's a maiden! good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Tendulkar gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
defended towards gully and they scamper through for a single - Gibbs sprints in from the edge of the circle and has a shy at the striker's end but surprisingly he fails to hit the target.
driven away to sweeper cover
driven away off the front-foot and the ball rolls down to long-off

de Villiers pulls off a stunner and we are back to square one. Too short and too wide outside the off stump - Tendulkar goes for the cut but fails to keeps it down, de Villiers at cover point drives across full length to his left and takes it as clean as a whistle.
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Dhoni watchfully leaves it through to the keeper
wide delivery outside the off stump - Dhoni is not interested. Coffin- filler of an over comes to an end.
short of a good length delivery, angled across the left-hander - they know Mongia like it there - opens the face of the bat and runs it straight to the fielder at gully
another awkward looking cut, ball clips the bottom edge and rolls back to the keeper
much better shot - driven with a straight bat to long-off for a single
on the middle and leg stump line - this one nipped back in, Dhoni looking to work it away on the leg side fails to get bat on ball
eureka. This time he gets bat on ball attempting the same shot and the ball rolls away towards midwicket - off the mark with a quick single
defended on the front-foot
full and wide outside the off stump, drives away from his body and the ball goes in the air towards third man
goes for the heave but gets nowhere near the line
good length delivery down the leg side
good length delivery, Mongia goes for the drive and the ball races away off the inside edge to the fine leg fence
defended on the back-foot
driven down to mid-off
driven away towards cover.
driven away just wide of the fielder at cover - dangerous single added to the total
nudged down to third man
comes down the track and gets it away to deep midwicket for a single - not a well timed shot
defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls back to the bowler
short of a good length delivery, again in the channel outside the off stump. Dhoni shuffles across and taps it away towards point
worked away well in front of square leg - Pollock ends up with figures of 10.0 - 4 - 17 - 2  - even better than that of the current miss Universe.
good length delivery on the stumps, Dhoni comes down the track and whips it away to deep midwicket - all the effort for just a single
gets forward and drives it away towards cover
off the inner half of the bat and the the ball rolls away towards wide long-off
finds the gap between the cover fielders
left alone outside the off stump
turned away towards square leg
short rising delivery, Dhoni hops into position and taps it away behind point for a single
short of a good length delivery, driven off the back-foot and the ball finds the fielder at cover
worked away on the leg side - just a single
short delivery down the leg side, Dhoni rocks back and pulls it away straight to the fielder at deep fine leg
short of a good length delivery, pitched on middle and off stump angling across - Mongia stands tall on the back-foot and drives it away towards wide mid-off
short and angled across from wide of the crease - Mongia stands tall and turns it away towards midwicket for a single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Mongia waits for the ball - nicely opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man.
punched off the back-foot, cover fielder moves across quickly and cuts off the single

good length delivery, close to the off stump line and it looked as if the ball stopped a bit after hitting the track. Dhoni drives off the back-foot and the ball rolls back off the inner half of the bat
wicket to wicket delivery, tamely played away towards cover
finds the gap between the cover fielders

harmless delivery on the middle and leg stump line - Mongia moves across a long way( make that a mile)  in an effort to loft the ball down to fine leg but fails to make contact and the ball crashes into the stumps.
driven through extra cover
defended on the front-foot
worked away to deep midwicket
turned away through midwicket
shuffles across and taps it away towards midwicket
fuller length delivery, driven straight to the fielder at deep cover
good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, driven through mid-on for an easy single
good length delivery outside the off stump, Karthik waits for the ball and at the last moment runs it down to the third man fence - nicely opened the face of the bat at the point of impact.
worked away towards midwicket
forced away towards backward point
drifting down the leg side, Karthik has a swipe at it but fails to make contact, Ball rolls away off the pad to the fine leg region
punched down to long-on, easy single to end the over
that's a unique shot! good length delivery outside the off stump - Karthik shuffles across a long way, manages to gets inside the line and then he lofts it over the keeper - cheaky
defended outside the off stump
pitched up outside the off stump, Karthik goes for the drive but fails to make contact
this one nipped back in sharply and Karthik is beaten all ends up - ball clips the pad and rolls away behind the stumps, Nel was confrident that he had got his man but the umpire was unmoved
bouncer to end the over - Karthik ducks under it
wicket to wicket delivery - Dhoni on the back-foot defending
bit of width offered and Dhoni chops it away behind point for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump, Karthik is sucked forward into the drive - ball clips the inside edge and rolls down to fine leg
swing and a miss outside the off stump
slower delivery and Dhoni works it away on the leg side
short delivery on the stumps, Karthik goes for the upper cut but misses the target by miles
leg-cutter, Dhoni stands his ground and drives hard and the ball goes past the outside edge
there we go - fuller length delivery on the stumps, right in the slot and Dhoni lofts it over the long-on fence
worked away towards midwicket and they scamper through for a single

short of a good length delivery outside the off stump - bit of extra bounce there - Karthik looking to nudge it through the vacant slip area is done in by the extra bounce - ball slides off the face of the bat and goes straight to Boucher behind the stumps
flicked away to deep midwicket and that's 1000 ODI runs for Pathan.
good length delivery outside the off stump, Dhoni too plays at it with an angled bat but he fails to edge it to the keeper, ball rolls away towards gully

turned away off the back-foot to and the ball rolls away well in front of square leg - Boucher sprints across all the way and picks it up with a lovely slide, the direct hit was the icing on the cake but Dhoni was never in trouble. Ball ricochets off the stumps and two more runs are added to the total
goes for the pull but the shot is not timed well enough and the ball rolls back to the bowler
massive! short delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Dhoni wings up and unleashes a massive hook shot, ball flies over the square leg fence
driven away towards cover point
worked away towards midwicket
mistimed pull and the ball rolls away towards short midwicket
worked away on the leg side
goes for the upper cut but fails to make contact

punched down to short cover and Dhoni takes off for a single but Pathan is not interested - Nel moves across quickly and has a shy at the stumps but he fails to hit the target - direct hit and Dhoni would have been history
driven off the back-foot and the ball goes through cover point
pulled away off the back-foot to the midwicket region
off the pads and the ball rolls away behind square on the leg side
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Pathan ends up with an inside edge and the ball rolls away off the pad
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Pathan leans back and cuts it down to third man -  again just a single, they badly need boundaries
chopped away towards third man
once again Kallis hits the right line and length - Pathan ends up with an inside edge onto the pad and the ball rolls away towards short cover. Good over for South Africa so far
cut away behind point - again just single

good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line - Pathan moves away from the stumps in an attempt to.., well I don't know what he was trying to do there. Ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the stumps - India six down
drifting down the leg side, Dhoni gets well inside the line and flicks it down to fine leg fence - easy runs
good length delivery outside the off stump, Dhoni gets forward and drives it away towards cover point
defended to silly mid-off
driven down to mid-on and Singh is off the mark.
Short ball outside the off stump, Dhoni has a swing at it but fails to make contact - Nel has a few words with Dhoni soon after. 'It's a disgrace to cricket' yells Gavaskar on TV
another short ball outside the off stump, once again Dhoni goes after it, this time the ball clips the outside edge and races away to the third man fence
defended to cover
goes for the drive and the ball goes past the outside edge

good length delivery outside the off stump, Harbhajan without fails goes after it but on this occasion the ball clips the outside edge and flies down to third man. Pollock moves across quickly to his left and takes it on the slide
big slog - straight through to the keeper

Et tu, Nel ! short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line - Dhoni swings across the line and the ball steeples towards wide long-on. Nel sprints in from the deep, throws himself full length to his left and takes a two handed blinder.
forced away towards cover point
good length delivery outside the off stump and Zaheer drills it through covers, that's a meaty blow!
good length delivery, Zaheer goes for the but but misses
pulled away off the back-foot to deep midwicket
tucked away behind square on the leg side
short ball, Zaheer leans back and pulls it away through square leg
another short ball, another pull, off the edge to long-on
short ball outside the off stump, Zaheer plays the 'I know what to do' shot and the ball goes through to the keeper
again beaten outside the off stump - another massive swing and he missed the target by miles
third time lucky? short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Zaheer pulls across the line and this time the ball flies off the meat of the bat
steered away well in front of point and the single takes India to 200.
the usual - beaten outside the off stump. This is excellent stuff from Ntini
bowled'm! fulltoss on the stumps - Kumble goes for the wild swing and the ball crashes into the woodwork. You miss I hit

inn2.comm: pitches wide outside off and moves away from the right-hander, left alone by de Villiers
slanting the ball across the right-hander, Zaheer pitches it outside off and cuts it away, left alone
full, wide and in the slot for the drive, de Villiers crashes it through cover point and South Africa are away
fullish length on off stump, driven firmly but straight to the fielder at cover
short of a length on off stump, de Villiers runs it down to third man, the batsmen put pressure on the fielder and run two
pitches on a good length outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
pitches on middle and slants across Smith who plays back and punches to cover
straighter line this time, on the pads, worked to square leg but it's straight to the fielder
oh my, that's a very marginal no ball and Smith moved across and was hit in front on the pads, could have been a close shout for lbw
pitches on off stump and holds its line, Smith gets behind the ball and defends solidly
losse ball, wide outside off stump and Smith leans into the cover drive and pierces the infield, first runs of the ODI series for Smith
defended on the off side, Sreesanth is pitching it a touch too short
too full this time, and on the pads as well, easy pickings for Smith who clips it behind square for four more, South Africa are off to a racy start
pitches on middle and off and slants across the right-hander, de Villiers lets it go
and again, wide outside off stumpa and slanting away, de Villiers shoulders arms
this time Zaheer slants it too wide outside the off stump and is penalised
pitching on off, moving away, left alone by the batsman
pitched short and de Villiers pulls it, he didn't make proper contact for it went high rather than far, the ball pulls up inside the square leg fence
left alone again outsidethe off stump, he keeps moving it away from the right-hander, he hasn't cut it back in as yet
width offered outside off and de Villiers chops it down to third man
pitches on a good lenth and bounces rather awkwardly and hits de Villiers in the mid-section
dropped at point, Kaif drops a sitter! short and wide outside off, de Villiers cuts that really hard but it went straight to Kaif, should have taken that
pitches on a good length and squares de Villiers up, the ball takes the edge down to third man
sprayed wide outside off stump
pitches outside leg and slants across Smith who moves across his stumps and gets hit on the pad
poor bowling, India don't have many to defend and Sreesanth can't keep spraying wide outside off
poor bowling, another wide, this time down leg side
bolwed wide outside off stump again, this time the umpire doesn't call it wide, Sreesanth's radar is malfunctioning
Sreesanth finishes a marathon over well, that was much straighter, Smith moved across and got hit on the pads, they begin to appeal but the ball pitched outside leg
pitched on a good length outside of stump, defended to point
terrible ball, full  and slanting on to the pads, de Villiers flicks easily to the deep square leg fence
better line, just outside off stump, defended to cover
short of a length outside off stump, de Villiers went for the drive but realised he was too late on it, pulls the bat out in the nick of time
short of a length on off stump again, de Villiers plays back and defends
fuller in length but the line is perfect, de Villiers defends on the back foot
Smith is loving facing Sreesanth, the ball was poor, short and wide, Smith waits for it and slaps it through covers for four
Sreesanth bowls it much straighter this time and Smith lets it go outside off stump
on a good length, Smith goes on the back foot and defends
lovely ball, it pitched on a perfect length outside off and swung back into Smith who drove at it, the ball beats the inside edge
Smith has a slice of luck, the ball was there for the cut and Smith went for it, he got a thick bottom edge that went to Dhoni's right and down to the fence
Smith is taking Sreesanth apart now, that was a fraction short and Smith latched on to it and pulls thorugh midwicket
glorious drive, the ball wasn't all that bad but de Villiers moved forward and timed it superbly through covers for four
better length and straighter line on middle stump, defended on the back foot
left alone outside off stump, Zaheer is slanting it across de Villiers again
and again, its very wide outside off and de Villiers can't be bothered to play at it
terrific shot, short of a length but wide outside off, de Villiers gets on the front foot and cuts hard between cover and point
no width on ofer this time outside off, the batsman lets it go
pitches a touch too short and angles into Smith, tucked down to fine leg for a single
short and wide outside off stump, de Villiers was early on the cut short and didn't time it well
pitches outside off stump and moves a shade into de Villiers who gets behind the line and blocks
if you're bowling around 130kmh you can't afford to pitch it short, Pathan did, and de Villiers dispatched him over square leg
Pathan slips this on to the pad and de Villiers moves across and clips it down to fine leg, but there's no fielder there and he collects four more
Pathan drops short again, de Villiers pulls it in front of square for four, Pathan leaks 13 in his first over
fullish length angling into off stump from over the wicket, defended on the front foot
drifting into middle and leg, defended to mid-on
short of a length, slanting into Smith's hips, worked to midwicket
Smith is away against Zaheer, drifts on to the pads and he clips it behind square for a single
short of a length outside off stump, de Villiers tries to cut but gets an inside edge past his stumps
angling into of stump, de Villiers plays back and defends
flat trajectory on off stump, Smith gets forward and defends
picthes outside leg stump and Smith works it down to fine leg for one
flat ball, pushed quickly through the air on middle stump, de Villiers sweeps to deep square leg
off-stump line, he's not tossing it up, played to point
pushed to midwicket for a single
slower through the air this time, de Villiers waits for it and pushes to mid-on for one
fired in on off and middle, defended to cover
fast ball nearly in the blockhole, dug out to cover
pushed to mid-on on the front foot
slower through the air this time outside off stump, de Villiers drives to long-off for a single
pushed quickly through the air, no turn at all with the newish ball, Smith defends on the front foot
drifts down leg this time, Smith plays it to square leg
tossed up on off stump, de Villiers covers the line and defends on the front foot
not short enough to pull but de Villiers tries to anyway and gets an inside edge on to his pad
shorter in length outside off, de Villiers cuts through point for a single, he didn't time that sweetly
pitching on middle and off and slanting across the left-hander, Smith gets forward and defends
pushed to covers on the back foot, there's a slip and a silly point in place for Harbhajan
defended to silly point on the front foot
full ball on middle stump, de Villiers makes room by backing away and drives through covers, outstanding shot
slants down leg side and de Villiers glances it down to fine leg
pushed to cover on the front foot
drifting on to the left-hander's pads, worked behind square for one
full length, flat trejectory, no spin, driven down the ground for one
defended to midwicket on the front foot
defended on the front foot on the leg side
dropped short and wide outside off stump, de Villiers is back in a flash and cuts hard through point for four
driven down the ground to long-on for one
pushed through quicker through the air, driven back to the bowler
shot! Smith uses his feet, dances down the track and though he wasn't to the pitch of the ball he middled it and sent it sailing over long-on
pushed to midwicket for a single
full ball outside off stump, driven to cover
pitches on a good length on middle stump drifting towards leg, Smith works it off his pads to deep midwicket
tossed up outside of stump, de Villiers steers it behind point to bring up his fifty, he's given South Africa a superb start
dropped a touch short, Smith goes back and plays it to square leg
short of a length on middle and leg, Smith plays forward and defends
pushed through flat on middle and off, defended to midwicket
drifting down leg side and de Villiers tries to sweep, he doesn't connect that well and doesn't beat short fine leg
Harbhajan oversteps, poor stuff from a spinner, de Villiers flicks it behind square for one
deended on the back foot on the off side
floated slower through the air, Smith waits on the front foot and punches to long-off

half-hearted appeal for lbw, Harbhajan pushed that quickly through the air, de Villiers tried to sweep but lost balance and missed it, the ball hit him outside the line of off stump and runs down to third man
drifting on to the left-hander's pads from over the wicket, clipped through midwicket for a single
full ball on middle and leg, driven firmly back to the bowler
full ball again, driven wide of Kumble this time, down to long-on
pushed in front of point on the front foot
defended to short leg on the front foot
dropped shorter in length on leg stump, worked off the pads for a single, they are milking Kumble with ease
good length ball but de Villiers goes back quickly to make room and drive it through covers, he's using his feet superbly against the spinners
no spin for Harbhajan, slants onto de Villiers' pads, flicked through midwicket for a single
fullish length and wide outside off stump, Smith hits it hard but straight to cover
drifting down leg side, Smith moves across his stumps and sweeps to deep square leg
pushed to midwicket where Sehwag stops the single with his foot
poor line, straying on to leg again, tickled behind square leg for another single
full ball on off stump, driven hard back at the bowler, Harbhajan doesn't collect it and the batsmen run a single to long-off
fired in fast through the air, Smith uses his feet, steps down and flicks behind square
full ball driven to long-on for a single, they are bleeding the bowlers slowly but surely
defended on the front foot to cover
fullish length outside off stump, de Villiers lashes it to point
driven to sweeper-cover for another single
dropped short and Smith swivels and pulls it to the long-leg fence for four
Harbhajan oversteps again, and bowls too straight again, driven through midwicket for one
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
full length outside off stump, smith walks right across and sweeps from outside off to fine leg, Pathan does well to cut off the boundary
short and wide outside off stump, Smith thumps it through point and Zaheer runs across and picks it up one-handed on the fence
finally some turn from Harbhajan, the ball pitches on a good length and draws Smith out and beats him with the turn, Dhoni whips of the bails but the batsman is safe
defended on the off side
short and wide outside off, Smith cuts straight to point
defended on the leg side, Kumble's bowling very flat
full length outside off stump, driven to long-off for a single
well played Graeme Smith, he works that through midwicket for a single to bringup his half-century, he made three ducks in the series before this
defended on the front foot
fullish length and a touch wide outside off, driven to cover
full outside the off stump, Smith sees that the field is up and he smashes this high in the air down the ground, doesnt time it well but the ball lands between mid-off and mid-on and he's safe
drags one in short outside off stump and Smith pulls disdainfully through square leg
banged in short to the right-hander as well, who latches onto the pull but cant beat mid-wicket
short of a length angling into the hips, tucked behind square for a single
slower delivery on leg and middle, he rolled his fingers over the seam, defended on the leg side
short of a length and slants across de Villiers and gives him width to free his arms, he cuts hard but can't beat point
overpitched ball outside off, Smith clubs it past mid-off for four, his confidence is back and that isn't good news for India going into the Test series
worked behind square on the leg side
driven hard down to long-off for a single
tossed slower through teh air, Smith plays forward and gets hit on the pad
straighter line on middle stump, Smith defends on the front foot without any worries
drifts down leg side
full and wide outside off stump, Smith backs away and drives hard but can't beat the fielder at cover
full on off stump, de Villiers backs away and drives to mid-off

short of a length outside off stump, de Villiers plays a nothing shot, he tried to pull that and was no where close to connecting, he doesn't want to throw it away here, a ten-wicket win will devastate India
cut hard at point where Kaif dives full length to his right and makes a one-handed save
short ball, Smith gets on the front foot and tries to slog it over the leg side, he doesn't connect well and hits it just short of mid-on
massive massive hit, Smith treats Pathan with disdain, he steps down the track, makes room and lofts majestically over long-off
full ball outside off stump, de Villiers plants his foot forward and clubs it over wide long-off for four more, South Africa are going to finish this off quickly
driven to mid-off for a single, Sehwag has seven fielders in the circle by the way and they still get the single
worked off the pads to long leg for a single
full and outside off stump, Smith gets beaten, what a rarity in this innings
short of a length angling into the body, Smith cudgels that to mid-on, de Villiers leapfrogs over the ball
short of a length and it bounces a touch more and hits de Villiers  in the mid-riff
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Smith leans well forward and tucks it away through square leg for a single
drifting on to the pads and de Villiers efortlessly flicks it away to fine leg for a single which takes him to 69 and that's his highest score in ODIs.
slapped away well in front of point - they are doing it in single now
better line and length - de Villiers gets forward and taps it back to the bowler
cut away towards cover - no room for a single
short ball - coming in with the angle and Smith pulls it away well in front of square leg
tucked away off the pads to deep square leg
and he is celebrating his return to form - forget where it pitched, Smith just danced down the track and hammered the ball to the wide long-on fence - try stopping that
tried the off-cutter - too short, just stood up there to be hit and de Villiers dismissed it over the midwicket fence.
good length delivery, angled across - de Villiers plunges forward and drills it through covers for a single
driven through extra cover for a single
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Smith swings across the line and the ball rolls away off the bottom half of the bat
cut away towards point - dot ball
another swing and a miss, ball rolls away off the pad
good length delivery outside the off stump. Bit of extra bounce there and Smith gets it high on the bat, ball rolls away towards cover. Third consecutive dot ball
pulled away to deep midwicket for a single

Breakthrough! tossed up on the middle and leg stump line, Smith comes down the track and lofts it away towards long-on - Karthik in the deep times his jump to perfection and takes a smart catch. A fine partnership comes to an end.
worked away off the pads to the square leg region
off the mark first ball - tossed up and turning in, Pollock gets forward and drives it down to long-off
nudged away to midwicket - one more added to the total
wristfully flicked away through square leg for an easy single
worked away on the leg side
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, driven away through cover for a single
short of a good length delivery, pitched in line and angling across. Pollock moves back and across and straight bats it over mid-off. No protection in the deep and the ball rolls over the ropes
another wide delivery and once again Pollock goes for it but this time the ball rolls away off the edge
ah they have a flight to catch - short ball, pitched outside the leg stump and angling in. Pollock leans back a bit, makes room and pulls it away to the midwicket fence
four more! short of a length and wide outside the off stump. Pollock comes down the track  like a Viking in a batting helmet and dismisses it over the fielder at midwicket
short and angling across - cut away to third man for an easy single
doosra first up, steered away towards gully
quicker delivery, defended on the front-foot
on the middle and leg stump line, defended on the back-foot.
quicker delivery and de Villiers leaves it through to the keeper -  probably getting into Test mode.
turned away towards square leg for a single
glanced away off the back-foot and the ball rolls away square on the leg side
short of a good length and this one nipped back in a touch - de Villiers is beaten on the forward prod
short ball - pulled away to the midwicket fence. So what is new! just two more needed now
high fulltoss and it almost took out de Villiers - probably the yorker gone wrong - de Villiers manages to get bat on ball and an easy single down to third man completes the whitewash
